value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between herO and ByuN. herO just won the GSL Code S, securing him as the best Protoss player in StarCraft 2 at the moment. value.title: StarCraft 2: NEW PATCH - Broods Are SO FAST! (soO vs NightMare)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between soO (Zerg) and NightMare (Protoss). In this series we have games played with the new balance changes that were recently announced by Blizzard. Turns out Brood Lords are noticably quicker than they were before.
